author: Special Correspondent
text:
Youth taking part in the annual state-level marathon at Konganapuram town near Edappadi in Salem on Sunday.

A large number of youth participated in the annual state level marathon in Konganapuram town near here on Sunday.

The event was organised jointly by the Konganapuram Sports Club, Swelect Energy Systems and AGN School to encourage young boys and girls in sports activities.

C. Paul Princely Rajkumar, Revenue Divisional Officer, Sankagiri, and Kandasamy, Deputy Superintendent of Police, flagged off the marathon.

In the 42 km marathon for men, Vairavanathan of Coimbatore finished winner to bag a cheque of Rs. 42,000.

Naresh Kumar of Dharmapuri finished second to receive a cheque of Rs. 22,000 and Prabakaran of Salem was placed third and he got Rs. 11,000.

A sum of Rs. 2.5 lakh was offered as prize money to the winners in different categories.

President of the Konganapuram Trust, A. Ayigoundar, presided over the valediction and Vidya Jayant Kulkarni, Deputy Inspector General of Police, Salem range, gave away the prizes to the winners.
title: Good response to State-level marathon
